headline: Mechatronics Engineer
summary: Experienced Mechatronics Engineer with a demonstrated history of working projects related to the information technology and product and services industry. Skilled in Python, Creativity Skills, 3D printing, Electro-Mechanical Design, Product Design, and Manufacturing process, Also experience in data an\u00e1lisis, machine learning, computer visi\u00f3n, natural lenguage processing, robotic systems design, drone design, embedded systems, SBCs, and Python, C, and Java programming, with Bachelors degree in Mechatronics engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
